title: A Road in time
creator_credit: Brian Bosisto, Brian Bosisto and Associates, South Australian Film Corporation and John Dick
brief_description: With an eye to the energy crisis and environmental issues, this film gives a pictorial history of road-building in South Australia. As such, it also encapsulates the economic and urban development of this State. Contains b&w archival footage. Narrated by John Dick.
creator_credit_for_label: Brian Bosisto, Brian Bosisto and Associates, South Australian Film Corporation and John Dick
